text: Hello guys, I need help with my problem, we bought a sales professional account, and have created a `hapikey` according to the instructions but when I call API: <http://api.HubSpot.com/events/v3/send|api.HubSpot.com/events/v3/send> it doesn't work and it says `The scope needed for this API call isn't available for public use. If you have questions, contact support or post in our developer forum`. If anyone knows please let me know what I need to do. Thanks
